availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David Moss Hilliard (Green County, Ky, hotel keeper, Hickman County, Resident )

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer and hotel keeper. Kentucky native. Father of Bartlett Hilliard and Keziah Hilliard. Married to Letitia Hilliard. Father of David M. Hilliard and Charles D. Hilliard. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Hotel keeper in Greensburg in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 121B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Greensburg, p. 628.
"David Moss Hilliard Sr. (1812-1884)," Find A Grave, Memorial #135252573, accessed September 15, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/135252573.
